trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento, o menu de atalho que especificou o processador é apresentado sempre que o utilizador right-clicks uma célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando pretende apresentar menus de atalho determinados pelo estado atual ou valor de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é obtida, quer através de programação ou quando o utilizador right-clicks célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Propriedades para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e utilize estas informações para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade, o que substitui o valor de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento quando trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valor para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Também pode especificar menus de atalho para as linhas individuais em vez de células individuais, definindo a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade ou processamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>definição de propriedade substitui a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>definição de propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>substituições de eventos de ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos e a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>definição de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar `null` para um célula menu de atalho, no entanto, para impedir que um menu de atalho da linha que está a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
